original_text:
Who provides for the raven its prey,
    when its young ones cry to God for help,
    and wander about for lack of food?
korean_text: 까마귀 새끼가 하나님을 향하여 부르짖으며 먹을 것이 없어서 허우적거릴 때에 그것을 위하여 먹이를 마련하는 이가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who provides for the raven its prey
when its young ones cry to God for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그 새끼들이 도움을 구하며 하나님께 부르짖을 때

sentences.original_text: and wander about for lack of food?
